## 对b5进行 混合线性模型分析 考察交互 中期报告

### 必要的包
```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results='hide', echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(rstatix)
library(ggpubr)
library(lmerTest)
library(sjPlot)
library(parameters)
library(effectsize)
library(emmeans)
library(performance)
```


### 开始分析

#### fangfa
```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
mix_e_f <- function(dt, bname, sname, a, metri){
  # 数据准备
  dtc2 <- dt %>% filter(block_name %in% bname, stim %in% sname, AOI %in% a) %>%
    mutate(AOI=case_when(AOI == "b5_q"~1,
                         AOI %in% c("b5_a_1", "b5_a_2", "b5_a_3", "b5_a_4", "b5_a_5", "b5_a_6")~2,
                         AOI == "bg"~3),
           participant_group=case_when(participant_group == "a"~1,
                         participant_group == "b"~2,
                         participant_group == "c"~3,
                         participant_group == "d"~4)) %>%
    group_by(participant_group, participant_phone, trial_name, AOI) %>%
    summarise(fc=mean(!!sym(metri), na.rm=T), maas=mean(maas), tgjl=mean(tgjl), sas=mean(sas)) %>%
    filter(!is.na(fc)) %>%
    ungroup() %>%
    convert_as_factor(participant_phone, trial_name) %>%
    select(participant_group, participant_phone, trial_name, AOI, tgjl, maas, sas, fc)
  
  
  # 极端值处理
  outdata <- dtc2 %>%
    group_by(participant_group) %>%
    identify_outliers(fc)
  dtb3_r <- anti_join(dtc2, outdata)
  outdata2 <- dtb3_r %>%
    group_by(participant_group) %>%
    identify_outliers(fc)
  dtb3_r2 <- anti_join(dtb3_r, outdata2)
  outdata3 <- dtb3_r2 %>%
    group_by(participant_group) %>%
    identify_outliers(fc)
  dtb3_r3 <- anti_join(dtb3_r2, outdata3)
  outdata4 <- dtb3_r3 %>%
    group_by(participant_group) %>%
    identify_outliers(fc)
  dtb3_r4 <- anti_join(dtb3_r3, outdata4)
  outdata5 <- dtb3_r4 %>%
    group_by(participant_group) %>%
    identify_outliers(fc)
  
  
  # 模型拟合
  mixed_maas = lmer(fc ~ AOI* maas*participant_group+ (1+ AOI| participant_phone) + (1|trial_name), data = dtb3_r4)
  
  mixed_sas = lmer(fc ~ AOI* sas*participant_group+ (1+ AOI| participant_phone) + (1|trial_name), data = dtb3_r4)
  
  
  # maas 结果
  # 基本参数
  maas_t <- model_parameters(mixed_maas)
  maas_perfor <- model_performance(mixed_maas)
  maas_jh <- anova(mixed_maas)
  maas_eta <- eta_squared(mixed_maas)
  
  # 简单效应与配对检验
  maas_se1 <- joint_tests(mixed_maas , by=c("participant_group"))
  maas_se1.5 <- joint_tests(mixed_maas , by=c("AOI"))
  
  maas_emm <- emmeans(mixed_maas, pairwise ~ participant_group | AOI)
  maas_pair <- contrast(maas_emm, "consec", simple = "each", combine = TRUE, adjust = "mvt")
  
  # 交互作用可视化
  maas_inter_v <- emmip(mixed_maas, maas ~ participant_group|AOI, mult.name = "variety", cov.reduce = FALSE)
  # 模型固定因子效应量
  maas_p1 <- plot_model(mixed_maas, show.values = TRUE, value.offset = .3, title = metri)
  # 模型交互1
  maas_p2 <- plot_model(mixed_maas, type = "pred", terms = c("maas", "participant_group", "AOI"), title = metri, axis.title = metri)
  # 模型交互2
  maas_p3 <- plot_model(mixed_maas, type = "pred", terms = c("maas","AOI","participant_group"), title = metri, axis.title = metri)
  # 结果汇总
  maas_results <- list(maas_t=maas_t, maas_perfor=maas_perfor, maas_jh=maas_jh, maas_eta=maas_eta,  maas_emm=maas_emm,maas_se1=maas_se1, maas_se1.5=maas_se1.5, maas_inter_v=maas_inter_v, p1=maas_p1, p2=maas_p2, maas_p3=maas_p3)
  
  # sas 结果
  # 基本参数
  sas_t <- model_parameters(mixed_sas)
  sas_perfor <- model_performance(mixed_sas)
  sas_jh <- anova(mixed_sas)
  sas_eta <- eta_squared(mixed_sas)
  
  # 简单效应与配对检验
  sas_se1 <- joint_tests(mixed_sas , by=c("participant_group"))
  sas_se1.5 <- joint_tests(mixed_sas , by=c("AOI"))
  
  sas_emm <- emmeans(mixed_sas, pairwise ~ participant_group | AOI)
  sas_pair <- contrast(sas_emm, "consec", simple = "each", combine = TRUE, adjust = "mvt")
  
  # 交互作用可视化
  sas_inter_v <- emmip(mixed_sas, sas ~ participant_group|AOI, mult.name = "variety", cov.reduce = FALSE)
  # 模型固定因子效应量
  sas_p1 <- plot_model(mixed_sas, show.values = TRUE, value.offset = .3, title = metri)
  # 模型交互1
  sas_p2 <- plot_model(mixed_sas, type = "pred", terms = c("sas", "participant_group", "AOI"), title = metri, axis.title = metri)
  # 模型交互2
  sas_p3 <- plot_model(mixed_sas, type = "pred", terms = c("sas","AOI","participant_group"), title = metri, axis.title = metri)
  # 结果汇总
  sas_results <- list(sas_t=sas_t, sas_perfor=sas_perfor, sas_jh=sas_jh, sas_eta=sas_eta,  sas_emm=sas_emm,sas_se1=sas_se1, sas_se1.5=sas_se1.5, sas_inter_v=sas_inter_v, p1=sas_p1, p2=sas_p2, sas_p3=sas_p3)
  
  f <- list(maas_results, sas_results)
}

```

#### 参数定义
```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
bname <- c("b5a", "b5b")
sname <- c(1)
a <- c("b5_q", "b5_a_1", "b5_a_2", "b5_a_3", "b5_a_4", "b5_a_5", "b5_a_6","bg")
mlist <- c("fc", "afd", "dff", "ffd", "pd", "dw", "asa", "sc", "sad", "asd", "spv")


dt <-read.csv("/Users/placenameday/R study/edf_demo/data/processed/eye_tacking/ea/data/inner_dt_aoi_re_2.csv")

```

## 分析
```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
map(mlist,  possibly(mix_e_f, otherwise = NA_character_), dt=dt, bname=bname, sname=sname, a=a)
```
